anmeldelse.indhold: Altid, rar, hurtig og venlig betjening! Kan klart anbefale dette sted.
Lækker sushi, men jeg var skeptisk med deres sushi burrito. Må indrømme jeg blev positiv overrasket. Lækkert!
Rigtig god sushi men priserne var en smule høje iforhold hvor meget man fik

anmeldelse.overskrift: Thank you for a great experience!
anmeldelse.indhold: It is fair to say that, I haven't tried better seafood anywhere else in Denmark for those prices. The menu is quite unique with great taste and authenticity.
Oh I was really excited for this place, but the food is dripping of fat and oil. It's just too much. We couldn't eat up.

super sted
 lækkert fisk
 super søde personale
 priser der ok
 alt i alt lækkert
